extendedInfo.description: Price It Rite is a tool which allows you to make percent related calculations effortlessly by simply entering two values. Things you can use it for:- Garage sales - Home business sales - Discount pricing check How to use it: - Enter the desired value of the item being sold in the white boxes in front of the "COST" label. - Enter the percentage value intended to be made off the item in the white box in front of the "PROFIT" label OR press any of the preset percentage buttons to set the desired profit percentage value. - Total price at which the item has to be sold will automatically show up in the white box in front of the "PRICE" label. - The margin of profit made from the item will also show up in a terms of fixed amount under the "PROFIT" label. COMING SOON - Credit card acceptance capability. - Simplified in app calculator capability. LANGUAGES SUPPORTED English SUPPORT Feel free to contact us if you need any support by visiting www.flaretronics.com or simply email us at support@flaretronics.com
